name: Global Strike (itch)
description:
Demo of the game

pic.twitter.com/Fcz7HpnKFf
— AnshSharma.Code (@AnshSharmaCode) August 29, 2021

Controls-

-Tab to pause or resume

Movement:

- Mouse to look around

- WASD keys to walk

- W + Left Shift to run

- Space Bar to jump

Weapon:

- Left click to shoot

- Hold right click to aim

- R key to reload

- Press T key to inspect weapon

- Press E key to holster, and E again to take out 

Made By Ansh Sharma Games And Technology

Voice By Ninja Coder Tech

Background Music By Zaine3Beats
